about_the_game:
Nagino Mashiro" appears as a resident character as additional content for the second collaboration between Hele's Undersea City Project and Vtuber "Nagino Mashiro"!

●A special residence featuring "Mashiro Nagino" has been added!

This DLC adds research for a special "Nagino Mashiro"-motif residence that can only be built "one" in the game.
Please use the research to obtain the building and welcome "Mashiro Nagino" to your garden!

Mashiro Nagino" is moving to the Garden! Mashiro Nagino" will appear as a new character from a tourist to a resident!

Mashiro Nagino," who appeared as a "tourist" in the first version, will appear as a resident character in this DLC.
As a resident character, you can have her appear anywhere and anytime you like!
detailed_description:
Nagino Mashiro" appears as a resident character as additional content for the second collaboration between Hele's Undersea City Project and Vtuber "Nagino Mashiro"!

●A special residence featuring "Mashiro Nagino" has been added!

This DLC adds research for a special "Nagino Mashiro"-motif residence that can only be built "one" in the game.
Please use the research to obtain the building and welcome "Mashiro Nagino" to your garden!

Mashiro Nagino" is moving to the Garden! Mashiro Nagino" will appear as a new character from a tourist to a resident!

Mashiro Nagino," who appeared as a "tourist" in the first version, will appear as a resident character in this DLC.
As a resident character, you can have her appear anywhere and anytime you like!

fullgame.name: Helle's Undersea City Project - Bringing Air to The Garden

name: 『凪乃ましろ』コラボ記念住民化DLC
short_description: Vtuber "Nagino Mashiro" is moving to the Garden! DLC with resident character implementation is now available.
